title: Afterlife
description: Afterlife is the 11,000 word novelette companion to Vindicated (Fall of Angels). Cole Emerson never was and never will be a good man. He has his position for a reason. But there are consequences for returning to the world of the living. He is about to lose the one thing he still has, his leadership of the condemned. As if that wasn’t enough, one of his brothers is hell bent on exposing what has happened to Jessica and Cole has no choice but to protect her. And he’ll stop at nothing to do it. Even if it means ending a few lives. Cole never was and never will be a good man.The entire Fall of Angels series is now available.BRANDED - Book OneFORSAKEN - Book TwoVINDICATED - Book ThreeAFTERLIFE - Novelette Companion to Vindicated
author: Keary Taylor
